pages.text: $(br2)$(br2)This chapter will define the different classes in the Mage section of the class tree.

pages.title: MAGE
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Magic Missile$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to fire a bolt of magic on a 5 second cooldown$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes#mage_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: PROFESSOR
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Magic Inflation$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to turn a minecraft book in your hand into a Corail's impregnation version$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes#mage_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: WIZARD
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Wizard's Blast$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to apply slowness, mining fatigue, sundering, and weakness for 10 seconds to entities in a 15 block radius on a 3 minute cooldown$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes#mage_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: ALCHEMIST
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Healing Prepared$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to spend a level and gain a splash Instant Health II potion on a 30 second cooldown$(br2)$(l)$(n)Harming Prepared$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.secondary_active) to spend a level and gain a splash Harming potion on a 30 second cooldown$(br2)$(br)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes#mage_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: CLERIC
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Healing Word$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to heal yourself 6 health (3 hearts) on a 10 second cooldown$(br2)$(l)$(n)Healing Ray$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.secondary_active) to cast a ray up to 20 block distance that heals for 6 health (3 hearts) intially, and an additional 4 health (2 hearts) over time, on a 10 second cooldown (can harm undead)$(br)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes#mage_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: ENCHANTER
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Experienced$()$(br2)You passively gain +10 to your enchanting level$(br2)$(l)$(n)Reforging Arts$()$(br2)You gain a PMMO Reforging level$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes#mage_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: WARLOCK
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Ghost Form$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to damage yourself 4 health (2 hearts), but gain Corail's Ghostly Shape for 20 seconds on a 3 minute cooldown$(br2)$(l)$(n)Void Portal$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.secondary_active) to open your ender chest inventory$(br)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes#mage_home)RETURN TO TOP
